text: Nihsansaya, je loka apalyajavala konatehi pramana nasatanahi allahacya ayatimbabata vada ghalatata, tyancya manata ahankarasivaya dusare kahi nahi, je ya mothepanaparyanta pohacavanara nahita tevha tumhi allahace sarana magata raha. Nihsansaya, to purnapane aikanara ani sarvadhika pahanara ahe
